sen.j: 大文字焼き（だいもんじやき）は「大」の字を象った文字を松明の炎で描く行事である。
sen.e: Daimonji yaki is an event in which the shape of Kanji character '大' (Dai means big) is described with fire of torches.
sen.cmt: 一応原文どおり訳しましたが、これでは、手に持った松明を動かして字を描くように読めるので不適切です。改訂案：Daimonji yaki is an event in which bonfires are arranged so that they form a Kanji character '大' (Dai means big).
sen.e: Daimonji yaki is an event in which the shape of Kanji character '大' (Dai means big) is described with fire of torches.
Daimonji yaki is an event in which bonfires are arranged so that they form a Kanji character '大' (Dai means big).
